metadata.title: CVE-2023-38802 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
FRRouting FRR 7.5.1 through 9.0 and Pica8 PICOS 4.3.3.2 allow a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted BGP update with acorrupted attribute 23 (Tunnel Encapsulation).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.3
frr-pythontools - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.3
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.3
frr-snmp - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.4.2-1ubuntu1.3').
